data.name: wfa.executeFilePing
data.description: Wait until a File Statement returns a result or not

parameters.name: filePath
parameters.description: Path where the file(s) need to be located

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: File name or expression to check for availability

parameters.name: hasResult
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the file should be available or not

parameters.name: setRuntimeVariables
parameters.description: Flag indicating if an expected result will be set as a runtime variable

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: Connection where the file(s) will be located

parameters.name: wait
parameters.description: Number of seconds to wait between checks

parameters.name: timeout
parameters.description: Number of seconds to wait for a result
